<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Make the old fields of calendar screen blank.</description>
        <name>Correct sg_calendar_screen for My Sched</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function(){
	gs.info('inside "Correct sg_calendar_screen for My Sched" fix script');
	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_sg_calendar_screen");
	gr.get("4fcf2a5e73412300a26e12562ef6a7a5"); //Calendar Screen for My Schedule Applet
	if (gr.isValid()){
		var parentValue = gr.getValue("parent");
		var parentTableValue = gr.getValue("parent_table");
		var dataItemValue = gr.getValue("data_item");
		var orderValue = gr.getValue("order");
		if(parentValue || parentTableValue || dataItemValue || orderValue){
			gr.setValue("parent","");
			gr.setValue("parent_table","");
			gr.setValue("data_item","");
			gr.setValue("order","");
			gr.setWorkflow(false);
			gr.update();
		}
	}

	var masterItemGr = new GlideRecord("sys_sg_master_item");
	if(masterItemGr.isValidField("screen")){
		masterItemGr.addEncodedQuery("screen=4fcf2a5e73412300a26e12562ef6a7a5"); //Master Items for Madrid My Schedule Applet.
		masterItemGr.query();
		if(masterItemGr.isValid()){
			while(masterItemGr.next()){
				var screenValue = masterItemGr.getValue("screen");
				if(screenValue){
					masterItemGr.setValue("screen","");
					masterItemGr.setWorkflow(false);
					masterItemGr.update();
				}
			}
		}
	}
})();]]></script>
